item.title: Google Chrome 138 Will Be Last Version to Support macOS Big Sur
item.description: Google has confirmed that its upcoming Chrome 138 browser update will be the last version to support macOS Big Sur. Going forward, Chrome 139 and later versions will no longer support macOS 11, which
